      • divide

        private static int divide(IElement[] data,
                          int begin,
                          int end)
        Method to find the index at which main array should be divided (Quicksort is the 'divide and conquer' type of algorithm) Pivot is the last element among provided elements
        Parameters:
        data - - The array of IElements to sort
        begin - - The first index to consider during dividing the array
        end - - The last index to consider during dividing the array
        Returns:
        index at which the provided array should be divided in the next step
